mean_cn: v. 亵渎，玷污，亵渎，玷污
mean_en: to damage (a holy place or object) :to treat (a holy place or object) with disrespect
word_etyma: de毁+secr神圣+ate使→把神圣毁坏→亵渎
short_phrase: desecrate the land by dumping garbage
sentence: People desecrate this sacred land by dumping waste.
sentence_trans: 人们乱扔垃圾，玷污了这片神圣的土地。
